translation.choosePhoto: E koho i kāu kiʻi ʻaoʻao...
translation.chooseSubDes: No ka pale ʻana i kou pilikino makemake mākou e koho ʻoe i kahi kiʻi kiʻi pili i kou ʻano!
translation.enterEmail: E hoʻokomo i kāu leka uila
translation.enterPassword: E hoʻokomo i kāu ʻōlelo huna
translation.welcomeSubDes: Manaʻo mākou e kipa i kā mākou ʻaoʻao pehea e hōʻike iā ʻoe i ke ʻano o Mirror a pehea e hana ai!
translation.contactUsSubDes: Hoʻokipa mau ʻia ʻoe e launa pū me mākou
translation.helpedSubDes: Maanei hiki iā ʻoe ke ʻike i nā poʻe a pau āu i kōkua ai
translation.moreWishList: E ʻike i nā papa inoa makemake hou aʻe
translation.chatSubDes: No ka hoʻomaka ʻana, e hōʻoia i kou hale hoʻomalu! E hoʻolālā i kahi kelepona ʻelima mau minuke me kahi lālā hui Myrios i kēia manawa!
translation.peopleSubDes: Ma ʻaneʻi hiki iā ʻoe ke ʻike a hoʻouka i nā mea mahuka a pau i kou hale e hoʻohana nei iā Myrios i mea e hōʻoia ai iā lākou!
translation.seeWishList: E ʻike i kaʻu papa inoa makemake
translation.uploadWishList: Hoʻouka i ka papa inoa makemake
translation.createWishList: Hana i ka papa inoa makemake
translation.currentlyShelter: Ke noho nei ʻoe ma kahi hoʻomaha?
translation.enterShelterName: E ʻoluʻolu e hoʻokomo i kou inoa Shelter..
translation.enterSName: E hoʻokomo i ka inoa hale
translation.schedulingCalls: KA PAPA ANA O NA KELEhea
translation.title2: E hana i kāu papa inoa makemake
translation.title4_5: E kono i nā poʻe ʻē aʻe i kāu papa inoa
translation.des1: Welina mai iā Myrios! Hauʻoli nui mākou i kou hiki ʻana mai! ʻO kēia ʻaoʻao ke alakaʻi iā ʻoe i kahi kaʻina hana i kēlā me kēia ʻanuʻu i ka hana ʻana a hoʻouka i kāu papa inoa makemake
translation.des2: E hana i kahi papa inoa me ka inoa FIRST WALE a laila e hoʻokomo i ka WISHLIST Ma laila ʻoe e hoʻomaka ai e hana i kāu papa inoa makemake! Kaomi Hana i kahi papa inoa
translation.des3: Maʻaneʻi, hiki iāʻoe ke mālama i kāu mau makemake
translation.des4: E ʻike ʻia kēia pale i ke kaomi ʻana… Kaomi e kono i kekahi e “VIEW ONLY” Ke kaomi ʻia, e like me kēia…”
translation.des5: E kaomi i ka COPY LINK Ke kope ʻia ka loulou, hiki iā ʻoe ke hoʻi i Myrios a hoʻokomo i ka loulou ma ka ʻaoʻao papa inoa makemake! Ma hope o kēlā, hiki iā ʻoe ke hoʻomaka e hoʻohui i kāu papa inoa makemake!!
translation.des6: Kaomi ma ka huahana i makemake ʻia, kaomi i ka Heart icon ma ka hema hema
translation.des7: E ʻike ʻoe i ka mea i hoʻohui maikaʻi ʻia Hiki iā ʻoe ke hoʻokele i kāu papa inoa ma ka hele ʻana i Account & Lists > Your Lists > Your Lists
